title: my friend cant gift
body: he says it doesnt let him click it or it says "feature not avilable yet"

replies.body:
The *Gifting Center* hasn't made its way to the Beta Client just yet. Your friend can access gifting from the Legacy Client at the login screen:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg

Let me know if this helped!
The gifting feature isn't in the new client yet, if your friend switches back to the old client they should be able to gift.
